steps.name: TemplateEngine_Render Auto HTML Table
steps.description:
This Action will render a complete HTML table from the JSON/Array input.
Note -The output can be used directly in a HTML <body> however for xtra functionality use the predefined Widget.

parameters.name: ScriptParametersEntityFields

metadata.title: Insights
metadata.description: This widget contains all the Insights from the Playbook Insights actions, general Insights and any other Insights you have added. They will be presented in HTML format

config.htmlContent:
"General insight" has no output:
no return value,
no JSON,
there is nothing we can do here

match_found : [1_simple string match.match_found]

Word serched for : [1_simple string match.JsonResult| "matches.search"]

Count found : [1_simple string match.JsonResult| "matches" | count()]

Now with formatting:
match_found : [2_Simple string match, formatted.match_found]
Word serched for : [2_Simple string match, formatted.JsonResult| "matches.search"]

Cound found : [2_Simple string match, formatted.JsonResult| "matches" | count()]

metadata.description: Multi matches is not an Array

config.htmlContent:
Dump the JSON to HTML:
[3_json, comma separated and arrays.JsonResult]

If from this [{}, {}] we select a key (matches.search), Siemplify converts to a comma separated string
[3_json, comma separated and arrays.JsonResult| "matches.search"]

Wrapping this in [] does not make a valid arrays
[[3_json, comma separated and arrays.JsonResult| "matches.search"]]

If JS executes before HTML is rendered, it cannot inject data.  Put JS at the end of the HTML, use body=onload, or Jquery $.ready to have JS execute after objects created

        
Count: 

        
Strings:

As Siemplify builds the HTML widget it looks and replaces VALID placeholders only.  

        
Count: 

        
Why didn't Count populate?  Open Dev Tools, inspect the iframe. i) clear and check Console as you refresh the widget ii) inspect the code, did it resolve?

Hello World, I'm a smart widget and can be used for reference copy/paste
I can change colour
I have jquery and underscore preloaded
And though I'm in a iFrame (aka isolate) I know my parent URL for hotlinks:

metadata.description: Convert a basic HTML table into interactive with JS

config.htmlContent:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<head>
    <script>
    	dataTheme = window.parent.document.getElementsByTagName("html")[0].getAttribute("data-theme")
    	document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', dataTheme)
    	document.documentElement.classList.add("smp-theme-"+dataTheme)
    </script>
    <script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.6.1.min.js" integrity="sha256-o88AwQnZB+VDvE9tvIXrMQaPlFFSUTR+nldQm1LuPXQ=" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
	<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jquery.tablesorter/2.31.3/js/jquery.tablesorter.min.js" integrity="sha512-qzgd5cYSZcosqpzpn7zF2ZId8f/8CHmFKZ8j7mU4OUXTNRd5g+ZHBPsgKEwoqxCtdQvExE5LprwwPAgoicguNg==" crossorigin="anonymous" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></script>
	<style>
		html[data-theme='light']{--background-color:hsl(0, 0%, 100%);--text-color:hsl(237, 12%, 35%);;}
		html[data-theme='dark']{	--background-color:hsl(240, 16%, 16%);--text-color:hsl(240, 4%, 71%);;}
		html[data-theme='dark-gray']{--background-color:hsl(221, 35%, 20%);;--text-color:hsl(216, 45%, 84%);;}
		body{background:var(--background-color);color: var(--text-color);	font-family: "Open Sans", "sans-serif";	}    
	</style>
	<script type="text/javascript">
				dataTheme = window.parent.document.getElementsByTagName("html")[0].getAttribute("data-theme")
				document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', dataTheme)
				document.documentElement.classList.add("smp-theme-"+dataTheme)
				$( document ).ready(function() {
					$("th").click(function(e){    
						if(! $(this).parent().parent().is("thead")){
							$(this)[0].classList.toggle('hidden')
							$(this).next('td').toggle();
							e.stopPropagation();   
						}
					});
					$(function() {
						$("table").tablesorter();
					});

				})
	</script>
</head>
<body>
[7_Auto JSON to HTML Table.ScriptResult]
</body>
</html>

8_Native Jinja
[8_Native Jinja.ScriptResult]

9 Jinja Auto HTML
[9 Jinja Auto HTML.ScriptResult]
